name: Trails of the last day
description:
A zombie apocalypse game where you play as the last survival team of humankind

system requirements

Memory: 8 GB RAM.

Graphics: CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.6 GHz / AMD Athlon II X2 240 2.8 GHz.

Processor: Intel i7 3770.

Storage: 500MB available space

Control

Esc = Help and Resume

R = Restart

WASD + mouse = move

Right click = aim
left click = shoot

press 1 to hide mouse cursor

press 2 to enable mouse cursor
